name: ActualWeekday
comment: current day of week

name: Date
comment: current date

name: Time
comment: current time

name: RoomTemp
comment: raw value current room temperature and sensorstate (without any correction)

name: RoomTempCorrection
comment: room temperature correction

name: DisplayedHc1RoomTempDesired
comment: 0= >5Â°C, currently displayed room temperature setpoint

name: Hc1OPMode
comment: operation mode of the first heating circuit

name: Hc1DayTemp
comment: day setpoint

name: Hc1NightTemp
comment: lowering temperature setpoint of the first heating circuit

name: Hc1QuickVetoTemp
comment: manual override setpoint of the first heating circuit

name: Hc1HolidayRoomTemp
comment: 4.5=frostprotect, room setpoint during holidays

name: Hc1SFMode
comment: activated special function of first heating circuit

name: Hc1HolidayStartPeriod
comment: first heating circuit's start date of holidays

name: Hc1HolidayEndPeriod
comment: first heating circuit's end date of holidays

name: Hc1BankHolidayStartPeriod
comment: first heating circuit's start date of bank holidays

name: Hc1BankHolidayEndPeriod
comment: first heating circuit's end date of bank holidays

name: HwcTempDesired
comment: setpoint of domestic hot water circuit

name: HcName1
comment: labelling of the first heating circuit (only A-Z,0-9,blank)

name: ContactName
comment: installer's name (only A-Z,0-9,blank)

name: PhoneNumber
comment: installer's telephone number (only 0-9,-,blank)

name: MaintenanceDate
comment: date of the next maintenance service

name: LcdContrastValue
comment: setting of the LCD contrast

name: SummerWinterTimeAdjust
comment: enable automatic switching over to daylight saving's time (when a DCF receiver is connected to the BMU the value is set fix to ON)

name: LanguageVariant
comment: display language

name: BMUFlowTempOrVF1
comment: value of either an externally connected flow temperature sensor or the BMU's internal flow sensor if an external sensor is missing

name: RoomTempOffsetSelfWarming
comment: room temperature intrinsic heating offset

name: Hc12stepanalogCtrl
comment: two-point / analogue control

name: Hc1LineMatchingAdaption
comment: adjustment of closed loop control

name: CirPump
comment: circulation pump's state

name: Hc1ActualFlowTempDesired
comment: current flow temperature setpoint of the first heating circuit

name: HwcCircuitActive
comment: domestic hot water circuit is enabled

name: HwcLegioStartDay
comment: weekday on which legionella protection is started (may also be every day of the week)

name: HwcLegioStartTime
comment: time on which legionella protection is started

name: DisplayedHwcStorageTemp
comment: display of the storage's temperature (also in case of an SP1error)

name: HwcActualTempDesired
comment: current domestic hot water setpoint

name: KeyCodeforConfigMenu
comment: code for the installer's menues

name: GlobalSystemOff
comment: Set to TRUE if "System Off" is selected

name: StatusDcf
comment: status of the DCF signal

name: DcfIsValid
comment: validity of DCF signal

name: ACTOstorDetected
comment: indicates that an ACTOstor has been detected

name: ActualRoomTempDesiredHc1
comment: current room setpoint considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms

name: B51000M7OpModeMonitor
comment: operation mode sent via B5 10 00 (0 = auto, 1 = forced off, 2 = forced CH, 3 = forced DHW)

name: B51000M8HeatFlowSetMonitor
comment: flow temperature setpoint sent via B5 10 00 to the BMU

name: B51000M9TappingSetMon
comment: DHW setpoint without loading offset (for hydraulic map H1)

name: B51000M10HwcFlowSetMon
comment: flow setpoint DHW sent via B5 10 00

name: B51000M12DisableBitsMon
comment: bits 0-7: disable CH/disable DHW tapping/disable DHW tank loading/not used/clear burner blocking DHW/dis, disable bits sent via B5 10 00 (left bit 0, right bit 7)

name: B51000M14Monitor
comment: bits 0-7: remote control CH pump/release backup heater/release cooling/not used/left stop position DHW o, bits sent in M14 of B5 10 00 (left bit 0, right bit 7; relevant is bit 0: remote control of CH pump)

name: TestVarActivateFunction
comment: 0=All SF_OFF11/2=1DayHolON/OFF13/4=1DayBankON/OFF19/10=1xDHWLoadON/OFF11/12=QVetoON/OFF115/16=PartyON/OFF119/20=Ventil.ON/OFF123/24=SystemOff_ON/OFF

name: HwcOPMode
comment: operation mode of the domestic hot water circuit set implicitly (0 = off, 1 = on, 2 = auto, 3 = auto sunday, 4 = party, 6 = one time tank loading, 7 = holiday)

name: BMUB51101HwcState
comment: flame is on because of either tapping or tank loading

name: B51000TempDesiredLoadingPump
comment: loading pump's setpoint sent via B5 10 00 to the BMU

name: BMUB51101BoilerFlowTemp
comment: current flow temperature inside the BMU

name: BMUB51101StorageTemp
comment: hot water storage temperature received via eBUS service B5 11 01

name: BMUB51101ErrorStatus
comment: error state of BMU received via eBUS service B51101

name: StartEepromUpdate
comment: update of the EEPROM has to be started

name: EepromUpdateActive
comment: update of the EEPROM has been started

name: ChimneySweepModeActive
comment: chimney sweep mode has been enabled by the BMU

name: HwcLoadingIn430Active
comment: DHW-loading is active in non parallel loading cases

name: LegioProtectActive
comment: legionella protection is active

name: InstallAssistant
comment: install assistant not active (0 = active, 1 = not active)

name: FactoryTestActive
comment: Factory Test Pin

name: CPLPLast24started
comment: circulation respectively loading pump has been started during the last 24h

name: PumpEnergySaveStateMonitor
comment: monitoring of the pump energy saving's state transition diagram

name: PumpEnergySaveCalculatedTimeMonitor
comment: calculated time for the heating circuit's pump's switch off time during pump energy saving function (depends on outside temperature)

name: actoSTOROPMode
comment: state diagram actoSTOR control

name: ClockSwitchSummerWinterDone
comment: automatic switching over to/from daylight saving's time has been done

name: MonitorEEpromInkonsiNumber
comment: identification of the last eight EEPROM inconsistencies

name: MonitorCurrentIPart
comment: current i-control value; updated every 3 minutes

name: CountryVariant
comment: country variant (0 = west, 1 = east, 2 = all)

name: DisplayedRoomTemp
comment: displayed room temperature
